means: 鼓励，使振作( hearten的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It has been very heartening to see new writing emerging.
sentence.Network_cn: 看到新著作问世非常鼓舞人心。
这是个令人振奋的消息。

sentence.Network_en: Heartening reports of victories are pouring in.
sentence.Network_cn: 可喜的胜利消息不断传来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 喜鹊 translation English | Chinese... ... 动 kĕxĭ 可喜  , heartening 形 xĭ’ài.
The sun lost its heartening power and the sky became grey and sombre ., 太阳失去了它鼓舞人心的力量 , 天空变成铅灰色 , 阴沉沉的.
in 2006 , for example , the education department brought out poor primary-school test results on the same day as more heartening GCSE ones .例如，2006年教育部门公布鼓舞人心的普通中等教育证书结果的同时也带来了有些糟糕的小学测试成绩。
adj.令人振奋的,鼓舞人的时态:heartened,heartening,heartens 同反义词同: [a.] inspiriting 参考例句英英解释形容词解释: cheerfully encouraging [同].

list.abs: China-EU trade and economic cooperation has yielded heartening fruits .中欧经济贸易合作取得了可喜的成果。
The sun lost its heartening power and the sky became grey and sombre ., 太阳失去了它鼓舞人心的力量 , 天空变成铅灰色 , 阴沉沉的.
牛津大学英语词典 ... adj:heartening news 振奋人心的消息. floor of a fireplace （壁炉的）炉床.

say , sergeant takes a rank from the back , wave call soldiers to be in of new idea control below , hearten spirit , behave earnest ground to rush to careless person .说完，中士走到队伍后面，挥手叫士兵们在新的观念的支配下，振奋精神，表现严肃地向草人冲去。

entry.def: If someone is heartened by something, it encourages them and makes them cheerful.

example.ex: He will have been heartened by the telephone opinion poll published yesterday...
example.tran: 他会为昨天公布的电话民意调查结果感到鼓舞。
该消息让每个人都感到振奋。

auth_sentence.content: It is heartening to see Thames Water embracing competition.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is heartening to see Thames Water embracing competition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is heartening to see Thames Water embracing competition.

auth_sentence.content: Heartening Fire in Babylon is a shot of pure adrenalin.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Heartening Fire in Babylon is a shot of pure adrenalin.

auth_sentence.content: That they have done so in better health is heartening.
auth_sentence.res_content: That they have done so in better health is heartening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That they have done so in better health is heartening.
